text: Ware ga moshi kore izen ni kare-ra o shobatsu shite, horoboshite itanaraba, kare-ra wa kanarazu,`omo yo, naze anata wa, watashi-tachi ni shito o tsukawasa renakatta nodesu ka. Sō sureba watashi-tachi wa, iyashima re kutsujoku o kōmuru mae ni, anata no shirushi ni shitagattadeshou ni.' To ittadearou
